bibl.title: Some Greek and Greek-Demotic mummy labels in the Royal Museums of Art and History, Brussels
bibl.seg: Ana Isabel Blasco Torres, Some Greek and Greek-Demotic Mummy Labels in the Royal Museums of Art and History, Brussels.

1. T. Brux. Inv. E. 8823. Mummy label of Hatres (bilingual [Demotic and Greek]). Panopolites, 2nd-3rd c. AD. - 2. Inv. E. 8506. Mummy label of Pesios (Greek). Nerebe (Lykopolites), 3rd-4th c. AD. - 3. Inv. E. 400. Mummy label of Seplylis [sic: read Senpkylis] (Greek). Provenance unknown, 2nd-3rd c. AD.
bibl.note: 1. T. Brux. Inv. E. 8823. Mummy label of Hatres (bilingual [Demotic and Greek]). Panopolites, 2nd-3rd c. AD. - 2. Inv. E. 8506. Mummy label of Pesios (Greek). Nerebe (Lykopolites), 3rd-4th c. AD. - 3. Inv. E. 400. Mummy label of Seplylis [sic: read Senpkylis] (Greek). Provenance unknown, 2nd-3rd c. AD.
